spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The biomancer is a 16th-level Simic spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The biomancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Bolstering Presence
entries: The biomancer magically emanates life-giving energy within 30 feet of itself. Any ally of the biomancer that starts its turn there regains 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The biomancer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.
